attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Your wife/husband/partner died...your income is devastated-in some cases to nothing---you qualify for WPA but the DWP cannot tax it so the inland revenue deduct it from your personal allowances leaving you with a negative tax code...stop this abuse of an allowance made to the most vulnerable citizens at the most vulnerable time in their life.  Shame on this goverment.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Stop taxing Widowed Parents Allowance."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
